Text.Value: Please keep an eye on her while you're looking for Master Halsin... just in case.
That's the plan. I'll do whatever it takes.
Your companion's a brave one. Not everyone would make a promise like that.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This player obviously is not the one who took the poison since they have not met Nettie!
EditorData.logicalname: No HasMet - Did not reveal tadpole

Text.Value: No, not yet.
Please be careful - for both your sake and Master Halsin's.

EditorData.logicalname: Nettie knows Halsin is in GOB

Text.Value: Any word on Master Halsin?
Then your friend's dead. No one else will free them from that tadpole.
But what about your other mission? Any word on Master Halsin?
Master Halsin studied that drow for days, and he was sure something at the temple could help his research. I'm praying he was right.
Please, be smart about this. Save him.
Please hurry - for both your sakes.
Sweet Father...
I found Halsin. He's dead.
I - Thank you. For trying, and for telling me. At least now we know.
He and the adventurers were headed to the ruined temple in the west.
Please keep an eye on him while you're looking for Master Halsin... just in case.
Then you'll both die. No one else will free you from that tadpole.
Thank you.
Thank the Father he's alive. Please, you have to get him out of there.
I hear you brought Kagha back from the brink. My thanks.
To lose such a great man. It just doesn't feel real.
Do you know where Halsin went?
Halsin's alive - he's being held at the goblins' camp.
Please keep an eye on them while you're looking for Master Halsin... just in case.
It was brave of your companion to agree to take the poison.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This player obviously is not the one who took the poison since they have not met Nettie!
EditorData.logicalname: No HasMet - Did not reveal tadpole

Text.Value: Leave.
I'm not risking my neck against that many goblins.
Excuse me. I think I need to be alone.
I hear you put an end to Kagha's treachery. My thanks.

Synopsis: After the scene where she scratches you. Player persuaded Nettie and accepted to take her poison. She told them their only hope is Halsin. Nettie is back in her room, she's working.
